body_html: @dlml: @aselle correct me if I am off, but I don't think keras API supports that at the moment. To get int8 model you can first load the above keras_model.h5 file using tftables to create TensorFlow graph. Next freeze the graph into .pb file. Then you can convert the resulting graph to int8 tflite using toco.

body: @dlml: @aselle correct me if I am off, but I don't think keras API supports that at the moment. To get int8 model you can first load the above `keras_model.h5` file using [tftables](https://github.com/ghcollin/tftables) to create TensorFlow graph. Next freeze the graph into .pb file. Then you can convert the resulting graph to int8 tflite using toco.
